description: This is a SplashActivity Kotlin source file for an Android TV application. It defines the splash screen behavior, including display of a centered 'HelloTV' text, a 3-second delay before navigating to the main activity, and handling key events during the splash. The class extends FragmentActivity and manages UI focus, delayed navigation, and back button interception.

classes.name: SplashActivity
classes.description: Activity serving as the splash screen for the Android TV app, displaying a message for a set duration before navigating to MainActivity, with focus and key event handling.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the layout, focuses the splash title, and starts a delayed transition to MainActivity.

methods.name: onDestroy
methods.description: Removes any pending callbacks to prevent leaks when activity is destroyed.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key events, providing visual feedback for OK/Enter presses, and blocks the back button during the splash.
